body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.43 is now available.

What's new in this release:
A number of new icons.
Improved support for alpha channel in bitmaps.
Many Direct3D fixes and optimizations.
More complete msvcr80/90 implementations.
A wide range of 64-bit fixes.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
